review: I never got this device to play because apparently it requires your TV meet an HDMI specification which wasn't clearly described in the product. After attempting all the solutions in the help forums, I returned it.I also don't like how the product can't be turned off and is yet another electricity "vampire."Finally, I ordered this thing in November and it went into backorder until late December. Clearly Amazon was rushing something to market that was only half-baked.

author: Amazon Customer

review: Outstanding performance.Other reviews have gone into great detail about this gadget  I'll focus on a couple of things.My home theater is part of a larger stereo system.  This plugs into the preamp and works absolutely fine as a source device.  I wasn't sure if it would come up properly, but it's been as solid as plugging it directly into a TV would have been.I was further impressed when I began using it.  The theater room doesn't have an ideal WiFi connection, however the Fire Stick is able to immediately start streaming shows with HD far faster than my PC or iOS devices can do it.  It's really something to see.The menus are intelligently laid out and everything just works.

review: This is amazing, especially if you already love using Amazon Prime. The only complaint I have is the parental control settings force you to enter your pin each and every time you use the stick. I wish there was some way to be more specific, like block adult content or rated R and above, use allow prime or free content to be viewed/played without entering the pin each time.
